Header.title: Pathshala
Header.paragraph: Common and secure One-stop userfriendly platform to manage the complete workflow of online system of teaching.

Services.name: Dashboards
Services.text: Our platform provides a detailed dashboard for eavery teacher and student to track their work effectively and have all their records under one place

Services.name: Assignment Management
Services.text: Teachers have the ease of assigning tasks to their students, analysing complete class perfomance and they could even update or change the assignments as per their choice.

Services.name: Easy setup
Services.text: Anyone with no prior experience can also setup their online educational ecosystem within just a small time.

Services.name: Secure and Rapid
Services.text: There whole flow of website is simple and quick and the data is arranged systematicaly.

Services.name: User-friendly
Services.text: The interface of website is such that anyone can become accustomed to it and website can be accessed from any device.

Services.name: Transparency
Services.text: There is no loss of data and it cant be manipulated so it plays a fair part for every user.
